        Writes a provided content file to a provided archive output stream at a path determined by the class of the component.
        Parameters:
        contentFile -
        componentClass -
        archiveStream -
        reservedNames - A list of files which already exist within the Zip Archive. If a .content.xml file already exists for a particular component, it is left untouched.
        componentPathBase -
        Throws:
        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException
